de.fzi.replica.comm.util
Class MessageCarrier

java.lang.Object
  de.fzi.replica.comm.util.MessageCarrier
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MessageCarrier
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Meant to simplify messaging by providing easy access to arbitrary identifiable content and seralization and deserialization methods.
Use it in conjunction with the ObjectMapBuilder.

Version:
0.1, 19.07.2011
Author:
Jan Novacek novacek@fzi.de, jannvck@gmail.com
See Also:
ObjectMapBuilder, Serialized Form
